Buffy Sainte-Marie, OC is a Native Canadian singer-songwriter, musician, 
composer, visual artist, educator, pacifist, and social activist. Throughout her 
career in all of these areas, her work has focused on issues of Indigenous 
peoples of the Americas. Her singing and writing repertoire also includes
